sentences.sentence: Although the official exchange rate is set around 7 kyats to one USD, the street rate can go as high as 1000 kyats.
sentences.translation: 尽管官方汇率被定为7缅元等于一美元，但街市汇率能达到一美元兑换1000缅元。

sentences.sentence: Although the official exchange rate is set around 7 kyats to one USD, the street rate can go as high as 1000 kyats (900 kyats as of Feb, 2005).
sentences.translation: 尽管正式的汇率被定为7元等于一美元，但街市汇率能达到一美元兑换1000元(2005年2月达到900元)。
